channel.title: WorldEdit
channel.description:
Not sure if this is in the right section, sorry.
Is there a way to get WorldEdit for single player? Single Player Commands isn't updated, and it looks far away from having WorldEdit again.

item.title: WorldEdit
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Since the new command system is open there will probably be a little bit of a wait until WorldEdit becomes a plugin again. The dev of SPC is probably trying to figure out what to do as well since his plugin is (somewhat) now in vanilla.

Read full topic

item.description:
@big_n12 wrote:

most likely there will be no more single player commands since they added cheat mode but you never know
